mapper.sql: model_id, delivery_area, free_weight, beyond_weight, min_price, beyond_price, is_delete, create_time, sort_number, company_id
mapper.select: select lm.model_id, lm.delivery_area, lm.free_weight, lm.beyond_weight, lm.min_price, lm.beyond_price, lm.is_delete, lm.create_time, lm.sort_number, lm.company_id, lc.company_name from logistics_model_acy_t lm LEFT JOIN logistics_company_acy_t lc on lm.company_id = lc.company_id where lm.model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into logistics_model_acy_t (model_id, delivery_area, free_weight, beyond_weight, min_price, beyond_price, company_id, is_delete, create_time) values (#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beyondWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beyondPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into logistics_model_acy_t
model_id,
delivery_area,
free_weight,
beyond_weight,
min_price,
beyond_price,
is_delete,
company_id,
create_time,
#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{freeWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{beyondWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update logistics_model_acy_t
delivery_area = #{deliveryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
free_weight = #{freeWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
beyond_weight = #{beyondWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
min_price = #{minPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
beyond_price = #{beyondPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update logistics_model_acy_t set delivery_area = #{deliveryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, free_weight = #{freeWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, beyond_weight = #{beyondWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, min_price = #{minPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, beyond_price = #{beyondPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update logistics_model_acy_t set is_delete = 1 where model_id IN
#{modelId}
update logistics_model_acy_t set sort_number = #{sortNumber} where model_id = #{modelId}
update logistics_model_acy_t set sort_number = sort_number + 1 where sort_number < #{sortNumber}
